name: rolling mill production | rolling mill | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/283/documentation

The values for plant area were taken from a map recieved during the visit to a electro-steel manufacturing and forming plant in Gerlafingen, Switzerland. The output was 616000 tonnes of formed steel in 2002. The Lifetime is assumed to be 50 years for infrastructure like buildings and routes, and 25 years for machinery and furnaces;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

The activity starts with the transformation of unspecified land to industrial area.

Includes land occupation data for and land transformation data to buildings, asphalted and green surroundings; land transformation data from unknown; the buildings; company internal roads, parking lots etc.; the main material of which the machinery is composed and their disposal.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./282:Manufacture of special-purpose machinery/2823:Manufacture of machinery for metallurgy

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The visited plant is in the range of size typicall for european union (about a quarter of the maximal size). Data-set is representative for European Union
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The visited plant produces hot rolled merchant bars, wire rod, concrete reinforcing bars, mats and cold rolled topar-S, topar-Rc and topar-Rs
